entries.text: Deprecated `kubelet-registration-probe` and removed related code. `node-driver-registrar` on Windows now requires Kubernetes v1.23.10, v1.24.4, v1.25.0, or newer. No changes on Linux; Kubernetes v1.13 is still the minimum version.
Added support for contextual logging and implemented contextual logging checks using logcheck, which can be run with make test or make logcheck.
Added support for structured logging (the log messages have been changed due to the activation of structured logging).
